title: Why does DOY not properly maintain the area between Leland and Wllmington on 74/17?  There are numerous potholes, crooked signs, damaged guard rails, lights out, vegetation blocking signs, vines and vegetation covering guard rails, trash and debris on the road side.  It is a disgrace to see this coming into one of the main entrances to Wilmington.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4003
